actions.name: Cheek Pouch
actions.description:
Trigger: The user consumes a [Food] item.

Effect: The user recovers 5 Ticks of HP in addition to the [Food] item's effect.

actions.name: Cheek Pouch
actions.description: Effect: The user possesses an additional [Stash] Slot.

system.description:
Effect: Whenever the user consumes a [Food] item, they recover 5 Ticks of HP in addition to the [Food] item's effect.

Passive: The user possesses an additional [Stash] Slot.
